data.title: Los Angeles Lakers
data.meta_description: Prices typically range from $2,800 -$6,000 for Los Angeles Lakers suites. Prices vary based on day of game, opponent, and the location of the suite in the Staples Center.

Our 100% Guarantee

No matter what happens, Suite Experience Group has you covered - your suite will be protected by our 100% Guarantee.

The SEG 100% Guarantee

We guarantee you will receive your suite tickets in time for your event. In the extremely rare case that you do not, we will offer you an alternative option if available or we will refund you at least 100% of your total purchase price.

If the event is canceled or if fans are no longer permitted, you may choose to receive a full refund or a credit towards a future SEG purchase.

If the event date changes, you will receive the suite you purchased for the new date.

Please reach out to us if you have any further questions at [email protected] or 800-592-7043.

Los Angeles Lakers Suite Prices and Details

How much do Los Angeles Lakers suites cost?

Los Angeles Lakers suite prices range from $4,000-$12,000 per game based on team performance, opponent, day of the week, and suite location in Crypto.com Arena. Premier Level A Suites are priced higher than Premier B and Premier C. Proximity to mid-court also factors into suite rental prices.

How many guests can fit in a Lakers suite?

Luxury suite rentals for the Los Angeles Lakers usually come with 12-18 tickets. Most suites will come with a base quantity of 12, and offer the option to purchase 6 additional tickets, as needed. Suites on all 3 suite levels at Crypto.com Arena are similar in size, layout and design.

Suite Levels at Crypto.com Arena

Premium Level A

10-12 Tickets

0-2 Parking

Catering Available

×

Premium Level A Details

Premium Level A Suites are the first (lowest) of three suite levels at the Crypto.com Arena. For most events, suites will include 12-18 tickets. Select suites will come with VIP parking passes. Premium in-suite catering options are available to purchase in advance at an additional cost. Level A suites are typically the most coveted suite options.

To book a Premium Level A

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Premium Level B

12 Tickets

0-2 Parking

Catering Available

×

Premium Level B Details

Premium Level B suites are located on the second of three suite levels at Crypto.com Arena. For most events, suites will include 12-18 tickets. Select suites will come with VIP parking passes. Premium in-suite catering options are available to purchase in advance at an additional cost.

To book a Premium Level B

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Premium Level C

12-24 Tickets

0-2 Parking

Catering Available

×

Premium Level C Details

Premium Level C Suites are the highest of three suite levels at the Crypto.com Arena. For most events, suites will include 12-18 tickets. Select suites will come with VIP parking passes. Premium in-suite catering options are available to purchase in advance at an additional cost. Level C Suites typically offer the most affordable suite options at Crypto.com Arena.

To book a Premium Level C

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Terrace Suite

14 Tickets

0-2 Parking

Catering Available

×

Terrace Suite Details

Terrace Suites are among the newest suites at Crypto.com Arena. Terrace Suites at Crypto.com Arena can accommodate 14 guests and are located just off the main concourse, bringing you closer to the action than a standard luxury suite. Premium in-suite catering options are available to purchase in advance.

To book a Terrace Suite

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

A Level Double Suite

22 Tickets

Catering Available

×

A Level Double Suite Details

The A Level Double Suite at Crypto.com Arena features a large space with two connected suites on the Premium A Suite Level. The A Level Double Suite can host groups of 22 people, and 5 additional Sanding Room tickets can be added.

To book an A Level Double Suite

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Premier Table at Yaamava' Club by San Manuel

4 Tickets

Food & Beverage Included

×

Premier Table at Yaamava' Club by San Manuel Details

Private table in the premium space of the Yamaava' Club at Crypto.com Arena.

To book a Premier Table at Yaamava' Club by San Manuel

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Premier Lounge at Yaamava' Club by San Manuel

4 Tickets

Food & Beverage Included

×

Premier Lounge at Yaamava' Club by San Manuel Details

Corner seating on Premium Level A inside the Yaamava' Club by San Manuel.

To book a Premier Lounge at Yaamava' Club by San Manuel

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Crypto.com Arena Event Planning Guide

Catering

All Los Angeles Lakers suites have the option to be catered in advance to the Lakers game. Making your selections from the the Staples Centers suite menu a week prior to the game will ensure your suite is fully stocked upon your arrival. Lakers suites offer a wide range food and alcoholic options.

×

Catering Details

In-suite catering is usually not included with your suite purchase, unless it is clearly stated otherwise. Catering is optional - you can choose not to have your suite catered, or you can spend lavishly, or you can land anywhere in between. On average, our Staples Center customers spend $1,500 on catering.

All private boxes at the Staples Center offer professional suite catering by Levy Restaurants. Catering orders for your suite must be placed at least five business days before the event. You can also place food and drink orders on the day of the game through the attendant in your suite. Levy Restaurants has put together a menu that includes different packages and price points. The menu details the minimum number of people required to place an order on a per item or package basis. All ingredients are listed on the menu as well, making it easy to plan around food allergies or sensitivities in your party.

Parking and Transportation

If your Lakers suite includes parking, it's most likely for Lot 1 Garage or Lot C. The VIP lot is connected to Lot 1, closest to the Staples Center. Guests arriving by public transportation have many options to choose from including the Metro bus and DASH bus. Ride sharing is also easily accessible.

Budget

When budgeting for a Lakers suite rental, you must consider all costs along the way. A Lakers suite could range from $3,500-$12,000. In-suite catering is additional and you won't be charged for it until game day. On average, suite catering is going to be about $1,000-$2,000 depending on group size.

Club Access

Perks to a Lakers suite include access to various clubs within the Staples Center. These premium clubs are located on each suite level and have different food options, full bars, lounge areas, and flat screen TVs. A great place to hang out prior to the Lakers game starting or during half-time.

×

Arena Club Details

All luxury suite tickets will include access to the exclusive San Manuel Club. The San Manuel Club is a high end bar and restaurant just for private suite ticket holders. Located on Delta Suite Level A, The San Manuel Club has many food options, a full bar, and 15 flat screen TVs. The San Manuel Club offers reservations. In addition, most suite ticket holders can access the exclusive Hyde Lounge at Staples Center, located on the C Level of Suites. This club has the feel of an LA Night Club with a view of world class sporting events and concerts. A select few suites also provide 4 tickets to the Lexus Club, where guests can make a dinner reservation for white table cloth dining in advance of your event.

Dress Code

The Lakers do not enforce a specific dress code on the suite levels. If it’s a corporate event, guests will likely be dressed in business casual attire or more formal coming directly from work. However, it’s not uncommon for guests to wear their favorite team gear with jeans and sneakers.

Venue Bag Policy

Any bags larger than 14” x 14” x 6” will not be allowed into the stadium, so please plan accordingly before you depart for Crypto.com Arena. All guests of Crypto.com Arena will go through security checkpoints upon entry as well. The Lakers do prohibit any food or drinks from outside the arena.

Entrances

Suite guests attending a Lakers game have access to VIP entrances: The Star Plaza VIP Entrance is located at the Corner of 11th St and Figueroa St, and the Southwest VIP entrance is located between the 11th street and Figueroa entrances. Entrances will generally open 2 hours prior to a Lakers game.

Child Ticket Policy

Children 2 years of age and younger do not require a ticket when entering Crypto.com Arena. However, they must sit on an adult's lap and may not occupy a seat. Any child 3 years of age and older will require a ticket to enter the arena and must occupy their ticketed seat only.

Frequently Asked Los Angeles Lakers Questions

Will my Los Angeles Lakers luxury suite be completely private?

Yes, all Los Angeles Lakers luxury suite rentals purchased with Suite Experience Group will be completely private.

Do I have to order catering for my Lakers luxury box?

No, catering is completely optional and you will also be able to purchase food and beverages the day of the game through your suite attendant as well as at the concession stands located throughout the arena.

When can I access my skybox?

For Lakers games guests can enter their skybox 2 hours prior to the start of the game.

Please view our Frequently Asked Questions or Contact Us.

We are always happy to assist you.

Lakers Spotlight

Current NBA Season

The Lakers are once again title contenders entering 2023-24. It all starts with Lebron James and Anthony Davis. James, at 38 years of age, is still dominating. The all-time great averaged nearly 29 points and over eight rebounds last year. Davis is an elite inside presence, averaging 12.5 rebounds and two blocks last campaign. They create one of the best one-two punches in the league. Besides the two, Los Angeles has immense depth at its disposal. Austin Reaves, D’Angelo Russell, Jarred Vanderbilt, and Rui Hachimura would all start on many teams. And the addition of guard Gabe Vincent, who starred for Miami last season, makes the Lakers daunting. Los Angeles has the star power and depth to win it all.

Crypto.com Arena, the home of the Lakers and Los Angeles Clippers, has state-of-the-art amenities. The Lexus Club is a members only intimate private restaurant, club, and... MORE

The Lakers are once again title contenders entering 2023-24. It all starts with Lebron James and Anthony Davis. James, at 38 years of age, is still dominating. The all-time great averaged nearly 29 points and over eight rebounds last year. Davis is an elite inside presence, averaging 12.5 rebounds and two blocks last campaign. They create one of the best one-two punches in the league. Besides the two, Los Angeles has immense depth at its disposal. Austin Reaves, D’Angelo Russell, Jarred Vanderbilt, and Rui Hachimura would all start on many teams. And the addition of guard Gabe Vincent, who starred for Miami last season, makes the Lakers daunting. Los Angeles has the star power and depth to win it all.

Crypto.com Arena, the home of the Lakers and Los Angeles Clippers, has state-of-the-art amenities. The Lexus Club is a members only intimate private restaurant, club, and terrace. The Delta SKY360 Club is the most exclusive dining experience at Crypto.com Arena, including courtside seating access, private entrance, inclusive food, and complimentary beverage offerings. The Hyde Lounge, a perfect environment to entertain clients, family, and friends, has VIP entry, suite level seating, TVs, and in-seat catering and bar options. And Los Angeles has incredible Suite opportunities. Ranging from 10-24 guests (with a chance to increase tickets), Suites include parking passes, catering, VIP access, and elite hosting areas. Bars, concessions, and restaurants are all accessible as well.

Past Spotlights

You have to give the Lakers credit: even after winning a title two years prior, things weren’t working out with the current arrangement, so changes were made. Head coach Frank Vogel is out, replaced by longtime assistant Darvin Ham. Russell Westbrook exercised his player option, but Ham tried him out as the lead of the second unit in the preseason, which could yield interesting results. Of course, there’s LeBron James and Anthony Davis, and their health will be key. Patrick Beverley and Dennis Schroder are also new additions.

Feel like the celebrities who attend Lakers games by catching the game in a suite at Crypto.com Arena. Luxury suites of all sizes are available, ranging from 12-132 people, and ring the entire 300 level of the venue. You’ll get the VIP treatment right from the start with a private entrance to the arena along with in-suite catering for any budget.

The return of the king always gives the “Lake Show” a legitimate chance at another NBA Championship. Four-time league MVP LeBron James will be joined by another recipient of that prestigious trophy: Russell Westbrook. The offense still runs through big man Anthony Davis as long as he’s on the court and upright. Davis played only half of the regular season while nursing a calf/Achilles injury. In terms of veteran presence, the Lakers boast a veritable who’s who on the bench. Rajon Rondo, Dwight Howard, DeAndre Jordan, and Carmelo Anthony may be beyond their All-Star glory days, but their experience remains immeasurable. Taking in the action at one of the world’s most prestigious arenas only get better with a Staples Center Premium Membership. Be it the Lexus Club or the San Manuel Club, fans can get a taste of real luxury in addition to Lakers basketball. For a true one-of-a-kind experience there’s the Hyde Society Membership. Parties from 2-to-250 can relax in the luxurious Hyde Lounge with dedicated account manager and concierge service, in addition to receiving invitations to exclusive events throughout the year.

How Do I Book This Suite?

INSTANT BOOK suites can be purchased online by clicking the INSTANT BOOK button.

Other suites can be purchased by clicking on the button and submitting your request. Our experienced sales staff is standing by and will respond right away.

Call us any time at 800-592-7043 to discuss options or ask any questions.

Catering, Transportation, and Lodging can be handled after your purchase by our world class support team.

×

Luxury Suite Costs

What determines how much a suite costs?

Suite pricing varies widely based on a number of variables including league, city, team, opponent, time of day, day of week, and suite location.

Day of Week: In general, suites can be slightly more expensive during weekdays (Monday through Thursday) because those days are ideal for corporations to entertain their clients in a suite.

League: NFL suites are the most expensive by because of the limited number of games (8 home games per team).

Suite Location: While just being in a suite is generally seen as the most desirable and luxurious seat in the building, some stadiums and arenas have multiple suite levels. If this is the case, certain clients are willing to pay a premium to be in a lower level suite that is closest to the action on the field. We will give you details on suite location as we provide you with availability for the game you desire.

Does it pay to wait to book a suite until closer to the event?

With regular tickets, prices will often drop in the days leading up to a game. While every once in a while the same occurs with suites, in general, pricing does not drop before the game. In fact, because of the very limited availability of luxury suites, it is advised to book a suite well in advance, as suites are often not available at the last minute. In addition, in coordinating events for larger groups (suites can hold up to 20 guests or more), it is often necessary to give guests a longer lead time to confirm their availability to attend.

Are there additional expenses I should consider?

If you are hosting guests in your suite, consider allocating enough budget to order catering for your suite. Catering is typically not included in the price of the suite. Suite Experience Group clients typically spend between $1,000-$2,000 for catering, with some clients spending even more if they order significant amounts of alcohol.

Are there discounts if I buy multiple games at once?

Some clients purchase multiple suites in multiple venues at one time. Suite Experience Group can provide special package pricing for clients who buy three or more suites at one time.

How can I maximize my budget?

If you are working within a budget and trying to maximize your spend, we would welcome an opportunity to further discuss your goals for the event and the different options available to you. Please call us at 800-592-7043 or fill out this form to get started. We look forward to the opportunity to help you explore your options in renting a luxury suite.
